agent_utterance: Kick things off with a tall glass of water now. After about 10 minutes, pause to check whether you're still hungry. If yes, choose a light snack you enjoy (for example a banana, yogurt, or a small handful of nuts) and take a minute to breathe slowly (inhale for 4 seconds, exhale for 4–6 seconds). If you're not hungry, keep hydrated and do a quick 1-minute breathing check-in. Reassess again in about 20 minutes. You’ve got this.
